meteringrange: EV 0-20 (at 73Â°F/23Â°C with EF 50mm     f/1.4 USM lens, ISO 100)
shutterspeeds: 1/8000 to 1/60 sec., X-sync at 1/250     sec. 1/8000 to 30 sec., bulb (Total shutter speed range. Available range varies by shooting mode)
imagetype: JPEG, RAW (14-bit, Canon original),     sRAW, RAW+JPEG
drivemodes: Single, High-speed continuous,     Low-speed continuous, and Self-timer (10 sec. or 2 sec. delay)
externalflashsettings: Flash function settings, Flash C.Fn     settings
picturestyle: Standard, Portrait, Landscape,     Neutral, Faithful, Monochrome, User Def. 1-3
compatiblelenses: Canon EF lenses (including EF-S     lenses) (35mm-equivalent focal length is approx. 1.6x the lens focal     length)
exposurecompensation: Manual: Â±3 stops in 1/3- or 1/2-stop     increments (can be combined with AEB)
recordingfunctions: With the WFT-E3A attached, image     recording to the CF card and to the USB external media connected to the     WFT-E3A will be possible as follows: (1) Standard (2) Automatic switching of recording media (3) Separate recordings according to image-recording quality (4) Recording images having the same size
exposurecontrol: Program AE (Shiftable),     Shutter-priority AE, Aperture-priority AE, Depth-of-field AE, Creative     Auto, Full auto, Programmed image control modes (portrait, landscape,     close-up, sports, night portrait, flash off), Manual exposure, E-TTL II     autoflash program AE
erase: Single image, check-marked images or     all images in the CF card can be erased (except protected images)
mirror: Quick-return half mirror     (transmission: reflection ratio of 40:60, no mirror cut-off with EF600mm     f/4L IS USM or shorter lenses)
afassistbeam: Small series of flashes fired by     built-in flash Effective range: Approx. 13.1 ft./4.0m at center, approx. 11.5 ft./3.5m     at periphery
isospeedrecommendedexposureindex: Automatically set, ISO 100-6400 (in     1/3-stop or 1-stop increments) Basic Zone modes: ISO 100-3200 set automatically Extension settable (with C.Fn.I-3-1): ISO 12800 High Tone Priority settable: ISO 200-1600
aelock: Auto: Applied in One-Shot AF mode     with evaluative metering when focus is achieved Manual: By AE lock button
colortemperaturecompensation: White balance correction: Â±9 stops     in full-stop increments White balance bracketing: Â±3 stops in full-stop increments Blue/amber direction or magenta/green direction possible
protect: Single images can be erase-protected     or not
shootingmodes: (1) Live View shooting (2) Remote Live View shooting (with a personal computer installed with     EOS Utility)
camerausersettings: Register under Mode Dial's C1 and C2     positions
powersaving: Provided. Power turns off after 1,     2, 4, 8, 15 or 30 min.
battery: One Battery Pack BP-511A AC power can be supplied via optional AC Adapter Kit ACK-E2 (with     optional Battery Grip BG-E2N or BG-E2 attached, AA-size batteries can be     used)
compatibleimages: JPEG and RAW images Only JPEG images can be transferred as wallpaper on the personal     computer screen
recordingmedia: CF Card Type I and II,     UDMA-compliant CF cards, via external media (USB v.2.0 hard drive, via     optional Wireless File Transmitter WFT-E3A)
recordingformat: Design rule for Camera File System     2.0
filesize: (1) Large/Fine: Approx. 5.0MB (4752     x 3168 pixels) (2) Large/Nomal: Approx. 2.5MB (4752 x 3168 pixels) (3) Medium/Fine: Approx. 3.0MB (3456 x 2304 pixels) (4) Medium/Normal: Approx. 1.6MB (3456 x 2304 pixels) (5) Small/Fine: Approx. 1.7MB (2352 x 1568 pixels) (6) Small/Normal: Approx. 0.9MB (2352 x 1568 pixels) (7) RAW: Approx. 20.2MB (4752 x 3168 pixels) (8) RAW+Large/Fine: Approx. 20.2+5.0MB (4752 x 3168 pixels) (9) sRAW 1: Approx. 12.6MB (3267 x 2178 pixels) (10) sRAW 1+Large/Fine: Approx. 12.6+5.0MB (3267 x 2178 pixels) (11) sRAW 2: Approx. 9.2MB (2376 x 1584 pixels) (12) sRAW 2+Large/Fine: Approx. 9.2+5.0MB (2376 x 1584 pixels) Exact file sizes depend on the subject, ISO speed, Picture Style, etc.
filenumbering: Consecutive numbering, auto reset,     manual reset. Possible to create new folders and select folders in the     CF card
focusingscreen: Interchangeable (Ef-D: Grid lines,     Ef-S {point of Focus), Ef-A standard focusing screen provided
focusing: Manual focus Autofocus (Live View image interrupted for AF): Quick mode, Live mode,     Live Face Detection mode
dustdeletionfeature: (1) Automatic sensor cleaning (2) Manual cleaning of sensor (3) Dust Delete Data appended to the captured image
focusingmodes: Auto, One-Shot AF, Predictive AI     Servo AF, AI Focus AF, Manual focusing (MF)
usbterminal: For personal computer communication     and direct printing (USB 2.0 Hi-Speed)
autowhitebalance: Auto white balance with the image     sensor
selectedafpointdisplay: Superimposed in viewfinder and     indicated on LCD panel
startuptime: Approx. 0.1 sec. (Based on CIPA     testing standards)
videooutterminal: (1) Video OUT terminal: NTSC/PAL     selectable (2) HDMI mini OUT terminal
meteringmodes: Evaluative metering with the image     sensor
printableimages: JPEG images compliant to Design rule     for Camera File System (DPOF printing possible) and RAW/sRAW images     captured with the EOS 50D
continuousshootingspeed: High-speed: Max. 6.3 shots/sec. Low-speed: Max. 3 shots/sec.
lowpassfilter: Fixed position in front of the CMOS     sensor
viewfinderinformation: AF information (AF points, focus     confirmation light), Exposure information (shutter speed, aperture, ISO     speed, AE lock, exposure level, spot metering circle), Flash information     (flash ready, flash exposure compensation, High-speed sync, FE lock,     Red-eye reduction light), Image information (Highlight tone priority,     monochrome shooting, maximum burst, white balance correction, CF card     information)
displayformat: Single image, Single image +     Image-recording quality/shooting information, histogram, 4- or 9-image     index, magnified view (approx. 1.5x-10x), rotated image (auto/manual),     image jump (by 10/100 images, index screen, by shooting date, by     folder), slide show (all images/selected by date/folder)
maximumburst: JPEG (Large/Fine): approx. 60     (CF)/approx. 90 (UDMA CF) RAW: approx. 16 RAW+JPEG (Large/Fine): approx. 11 Based on Canon's testing standards with a 2GB CF card, high-speed     continuous shooting, ISO 100 and Standard Picture Style Varies depending on the subject, CF card brand, image-recording quality,     ISO speed, drive mode, Picture Style, etc.
